reference.shortdesc: The category element represents any category by which a topic might be classified for retrieval or navigation. For example, the categories could be used to group topics in a generated navigation bar. Topics can belong to multiple categories.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Such classifications are likely to come from an enumerated or hierarchical set.
This element is equivalent to both the Coverage element and the Subject element in Dublin Core.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: .
